input.sentences: there were a lot of cool costumes at the party last night .
some of the couples came in matching costumes .
a lot of them were very unique .
afterward we all got together for pictures .
output.sentences: Tonight was the annual Halloween party.
All of our friends came and some couples wore matching costumes.
One of our friends wore quite the unique costume - it was hysterical!
The alcohol especially brought out the silliness in a few people.
I'm just happy we got some pictures to remember the night afterward!
